changelog:
- New Update: Beta 7a Fixed Bugs

- Module Manager Improvements
• Fixed bugs when flashing modules
• Adjusted settings behavior in Module Manager
• Fixed issue where some modules could not be removed

- Download Modules
• Added new modules in the download section
• Improved handling to prevent configuration override
• Note: Avoid flashing too many modules at once to prevent settings conflicts — remove or disable unused modules before flashing new ones

- General Updates
• Minor performance improvements and stability fixes
